metadata.title: CVE-2017-17094 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: wp-includes/feed.php in WordPress before 4.9.1 does not properly restrictenclosures in RSS and Atom fields, which might allow attackers to conductXSS attacks via a crafted URL.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
